mapper.select: SELECT A.c_lsh cLsh, A.c_zzzjlsh cZzzjlsh, A.c_userid cUserid, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(A.d_Jzsj,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'),'') dJzsj, A.c_spbh cSpbh, A.c_bz cBz, A.c_zt cZt, A.c_cjuser cCjuser, B.c_username cUsername, B.c_loginname cLoginname, B.c_phone cPhone, C.c_spmc cSpmc, C.n_spjg nSpjg FROM t_green_zz_jzjl A,plate_user B,t_green_sp_spmx C WHERE A.c_userid = B.c_userid AND A.c_spbh = C.c_spbh AND A.c_zt = '1' AND A.c_userid = #{cUserid} AND date_format(A.c_jzday, '%Y-%m') = date_format(#{cMonth}, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY A.d_Jzsj,C.c_spbh
